section.p: provides one convenient access point to your monitoring data. Use Monitoring > Overview to keep track of your services and virtual machines and quickly check their status.
On the Overview page, you can:

li.p: View the status of your cloud resources at a glance. As soon as you have defined an alarm for a service or a virtual machine and metrics data has been received, there is status information displayed on the Overview page. Different colors are used for the different statuses.
